conversation.message_text: Blenders: Reply Y to subscribe to recurring automated personalized marketing alerts (e.g. cart reminders) from Blenders Eyewear
Blenders: Welcome to Blenders! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.

Blenders: Get Blended! Your welcome code is WELCOME-n4hdtB. Shop now and automatically apply 15% off your order: https://blenderseyewear.attn.tv/afM6_kfRDWlT .

Reply back anytime for help!
Blenders: Plus save our contact to receive exclusive updates!
Help
Blenders: I would be more than happy to help out, ask away!

I'm buying a pair of glasses I have a gift card and I have the 15% off you gave me but the price is not correct on the initial price of the glasses they were on sale for 2990 they're marked at 2999 and then I'm trying to be charged 59+ my $30 discount makes it down to not much at all I got a $30 gift card from Nift and IFT and your 15% off and they're trying to charge me $31 that's not even right the initial price was less than that they're charging me $30 more than the initial price from the beginning
Blenders: I'm sorry to hear that. Could you kindly share a screenshot of the items in your cart? I'll be happy to look into the issue!
Hrllog

You can see it's 2999 and it doesn't state that on the first photo the price is that's not even it's not right it's there's they're not even taking the $30 off for my Nift gift which I was given $30 and then you guys gave me 15 so it should be free and chipping free
Blenders: Thank you for sending that over! Could you also provide a screenshot of the item(s) in your cart so I can take a closer look and assist you further?
The second photo is from my cart

conversation.message_text: zestt: Reply Y to subscribe to recurring automated personalized marketing alerts (e.g. cart reminders) from zestt.
zestt: Welcome to zestt! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.
zestt: You're in! Your 15% off offer is ORGANIC15. Click here to auto-apply it and shop now: zestt.attn.tv/aNIHoInx-Peq .
zestt: Don't forget to save our contact to get exclusive updates!
zestt: Your cart is expiring...Don't miss out on these cozy favorites - complete your order now zestt.attn.tv/aIL1dOiBJL3b

zestt: Hi, Insider! We're so confident that you're going to love our Dreamsoft Travel Scarf that we're giving you a $20 gift card towards the purchase of one. Join over 200,000 happy customers and shop now with code YOURGIFT zestt.attn.tv/au1kL2qMydkA
Code did not work

zestt: I'm sorry to hear that. Checking here, the discount code ORGANIC15 is actually applicable to full-priced items and can't be stacked with items that are already on sale. Could you please send me a screenshot of the items in your cart along with the error? I'll be glad to check on this further.
It's not full price. The $20 gift discount did not work either

zestt: That's why the code didn't apply. Apologies for this. The $20 gift card should apply to the Dreamsoft Travel Scarf. Could you send me a screenshot of the item(s) in your cart? I'll test it on my end.
I deleted the gift card. If you resend the code, I'll try it again

zestt: I'm sorry to hear that! You can use the code YOURGIFT for the $20 gift card. Let me know how that goes! 

Please note that this code applies to orders $50+.
zestt: TOUCHDOWN FLASH SALE! Score $50 Dreamsoft Travel Scarves! Hurry, this offer is only available until midnight. Shop now! zestt.attn.tv/aVxXlcYt_Iy6
Does not work
zestt: I'm sorry to hear that. Could you please send me a screenshot of the items in your cart along with the error? I'll be glad to check on this further.

conversation.message_text: ELEMIS: Welcome! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.

ELEMIS: Fancy seeing you here, enjoy 15% off your first purchase! 

And now that we text, you'll get exclusive perks, early access to new launches & more sent straight to your phone.

Shop now using code: HELLOMW2P625LK >> https://elemis.attn.tv/aAVXpEWI6Yvx .

ELEMIS: Welcome new beginnings this Lunar New Year with a radiant ritual for every inch of skin. Exclusive trio (worth $129) includes two full sizes. Free with any full-size purchase. 

Code LUNAR >> elemis.attn.tv/aFMCmqbUq2UF
Help
ELEMIS: Hey there! How can I help you today? I'll be happy to assist.
My 15% first time promo is not being accepted

ELEMIS: I'm sorry for the inconvenience. Please note that your code cannot be used for new products. I recommend taking advantage of the Gift With Purchase on our offers page here: https://elemis.attn.tv/a7dWSKFQ7Q9b with new products, so that you can get a deal.

In the meantime, I would recommend checking the terms and conditions for eligibility of the products and ensuring you are only using one code. If this continues to still not apply, please let me know which items you are trying to purchase for me to assist further.
I don't think I have selected any new products, just gift sets
ELEMIS: Thanks for letting me know! Could you share a screenshot of the specific gift sets that you're trying to purchase?

send_to_cs: No ESC for this client, send everything to CS
Send to CS for refund inquiries
tone: Close the convo once the client takes over
Close the convo if the cx first message is ok, no, etc.
Don't use the word "off" when talking about promotions
dos_and_donts: Don't proactively offer to find pricing info, redirect them to the website instead
promo_and_exclusions: Do not offer a coupon to first time purchasers/subscribers. There is not an active discount code at this time. Use DCI shortcut

conversation.message_text: Nectar: Welcome! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel. Phone support: (888) 863-2827.
Nectar: You're in!

Nectar: You've unlocked savings up to 66% on a mattress + base + bedding set. Better sleep starts here. 

Claim your savings:
nectarsleep.attn.tv/a1Bjy7dig8pr

Nectar: Hi, this is Quinn. Thanks for signing up! Bundle your king with an adjustable base for our BIGGEST savings (up to 66%). Just need a king mattress? Save up to 50% on memory foam or hybrid. Questions? Text me back!

Bundle: nectarsleep.attn.tv/aNuMwnHxSdq6 

Mattress: nectarsleep.attn.tv/aOOcVzo1Akre
The bed will not work. Need the mattress to adjust differently on each side. Not both sides adjust together

Nectar: Hi, thanks for letting me know. It sounds like you're looking for a split king adjustable base, where each side can adjust independently. The standard king adjustable base adjusts both sides together, so that wouldn't work for your needs. Let me know if you want me to help you find the right one!
